articles.title: Big Tech shows its good to be big, as growth slowdown leads to stock gains while smaller rivals find only pain
articles.content: After super charged, double-digital growth during the pandemic, the results this week from the five biggest U.S. tech giants showed a big slow down, as they grapple with inflation, looming recession and an overall slowing economy
